channel.title: Error Fetching Image
channel.description:
I get this error on start up on most client's, what is causing this?
[code]Uncaught error fetching image: java.lang.NullPointerException at sun.awt.image.URLImageSource.getConnection(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.URLImageSource.getDecoder(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.InputStreamImageSource.doFetch(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.fetchloop(Unknown Source) at sun.awt.image.ImageFetcher.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
If you can help me, you will receive this huge very good home baked cookie :o
[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm281/hungry_bunny/cookie.jpg[/img]
